subject: Bitcoin Hit $160,000 by Year-End? Our CNBC Interview Explains
body:
[On December 16, 2024](http://ation-ceremony), we set our end-2025 Bitcoin target at $160,000. At the time, it sounded ambitious—and it still does—given the scale of capital required to reach that level. Yet, based on recent developments, it remains within reach. For more context and insight, check out our latest interview on CNBC.

Bitcoin could hit $160,000 by end-2025: Expert: (https://www.cnbc.com/video/2025/07/14/bitcoin-could-hit-160000-by-end-2025-expert.html)
